Steps:
1. Navigate to Integrations page
2. Click on Slack integration card
3. Enter valid bot token
4. Click "Verify Token"
5. Verify workspace information is displayed
6. Click "Connect"
Expected Result: Slack integration is connected successfully status shows ""Connected"" workspace name and bot ID are displayed

Steps:
1. Navigate to Slack integration
2. Enter invalid bot token (e.g. "invalid-token")
3. Click "Verify Token"
Expected Result: Error message displayed indicating invalid token connection button remains disabled

Steps:
1. Navigate to Slack integration
2. Leave bot token field empty
3. Click "Verify Token"
Expected Result: Validation error displayed verify button disabled or shows error

Steps:
1. Navigate to connected Slack integration
2. Click "Edit" button
3. Update bot token with new valid token
4. Verify new token
5. Save changes
Expected Result: Integration updated successfully new workspace info displayed

Test Case Name: Edit Slack Connection Without Changing Token
Steps:
1. Navigate to connected Slack integration
2. Click "Edit" button
3. Leave token field blank (keep existing)
4. Save changes
Expected Result: Integration updated successfully existing token preserved

Steps:
1. Navigate to connected Slack integration
2. Click "Disconnect" button
3. Confirm disconnection in modal
Expected Result: Integration disconnected status changes to ""Not Connected"" all Slack notifications stopped

Steps:
1. Navigate to GitHub integration
2. Enter owner repository name and access token
3. Click "Verify Connection"
4. Verify repository details are displayed
5. Click "Save and Connect"
Expected Result: GitHub integration connected repository URL displayed default branch shown

Test Case Name: Set Target Release Date and Time
Steps:
1. Select target release date (future date)
2. Select target release time
3. Verify date is after kickoff date

2. Attempt to submit
Expected Result: Validation error: ""Kickoff date cannot be in the past""

1. Select target release date in the past
2. Attempt to submit
Expected Result: Validation error: ""Target release date cannot be in the past""

Steps:

2. Set target release date: today 2:00 PM
3. Attempt to submit
Expected Result: Validation error: ""Target release date and time must be after kickoff date and time""

Steps:
1. Leave kickoff date empty
2. Attempt to submit

2. Attempt to submit

2. Attempt to submit
